org.micromanager.quickaccess

Class QuickAccessPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.micromanager.quickaccess.QuickAccessPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MMGenericPlugin, MMPlugin, org.scijava.plugin.SciJavaPlugin
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleButtonPlugin, ToggleButtonPlugin, WidgetPlugin

    public abstract class QuickAccessPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements MMPlugin
    QuickAccessPlugins are used for controls that can show up in the Quick- Access Window, which shows frequently-used controls.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CELL_HEIGHT

      The width of a single cell in the Quick-Access Window.

    • Method Detail

      • getPaddedCellSize

        public static java.awt.Dimension getPaddedCellSize()
        Provides a dimension that mostly fills 1 cell in the Quick-Access Window. This dimension should be used by any "simple" controls (like buttons) to preserve visual uniformity.

      • getIcon

        public abstract javax.swing.ImageIcon getIcon()
        Provide an icon to use to represent this plugin when configuring the Quick-Access Window. May be null, in which case a rendering of the plugin's controls will be used instead. Note that if you want to use a null icon here, then your plugin *must* create some kind of sensible control even when there is no configuration (for WidgetPlugins), as the icon of the control in the configuration mode is derived from a non-configured control.
